name: icedtea

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: shenandoah
variants.description: Build with the shenandoah gc. Only for version 3+

description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
https://openjdk.java.net/ using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.

dependencies.name: alsa-lib
dependencies.description:
The Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) provides audio and MIDI
functionality to the Linux operating system. alsa-lib contains the user
space library that developers compile ALSA applications against.

dependencies.name: cups
dependencies.description:
CUPS is the standards-based, open source printing system developed by
Apple Inc. for macOS and other UNIX-like operating systems. CUPS uses
the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) to support printing to local and
network printers. This provides the core CUPS libraries, not a complete
CUPS install.

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependencies.name: giflib
dependencies.description:
The GIFLIB project maintains the giflib service library, which has been
pulling images out of GIFs since 1989.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gtkplus
dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
MozJPEG is a patched version of libjpeg-turbo which improves JPEG
compression efficiency achieving higher visual quality and smaller file
sizes at the same time

dependencies.name: lcms
dependencies.description:
Little cms is a color management library. Implements fast transforms
between ICC profiles. It is focused on speed, and is portable across
several platforms (MIT license).

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxau
dependencies.description:
The libXau package contains a library implementing the X11 Authorization
Protocol. This is useful for restricting client access to the display.

dependencies.name: libxcomposite
dependencies.description:
libXcomposite - client library for the Composite extension to the X11
protocol.

dependencies.name: libxdmcp
dependencies.description: libXdmcp - X Display Manager Control Protocol library.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxi
dependencies.description: libXi - library for the X Input Extension.

dependencies.name: libxinerama
dependencies.description: libXinerama - API for Xinerama extension to X11 Protocol.

dependencies.name: libxrender
dependencies.description: libXrender - library for the Render Extension to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxt
dependencies.description: libXt - X Toolkit Intrinsics library.

dependencies.name: libxtst
dependencies.description:
libXtst provides the Xlib-based client API for the XTEST & RECORD
extensions. The XTEST extension is a minimal set of client and server
extensions required to completely test the X11 server with no user
intervention. This extension is not intended to support general
journaling and playback of user actions. The RECORD extension supports
the recording and reporting of all core X protocol and arbitrary X
extension protocol.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: wget
dependencies.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.

dependencies.name: xproto
dependencies.description:
X Window System Core Protocol. This package provides the headers and
specification documents defining the X Window System Core Protocol,
Version 11. It also includes a number of headers that aren't purely
protocol related, but are depended upon by many other X Window System
packages to provide common definitions and porting layer.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
